item.title: An whale withdrew 2,143 ETH from Binance, worth $7.93 million
item.description: On July 22nd, as monitored by OnchainLens, a whale transferred 2,143 ETH from Binance, which was worth $7.93 million.

item.title: Federal Reserve Chairman Powell will deliver a public speech tonight, with the market focusing on his response to Trump's pressure
item.description: July 22nd. Chairman Powell of the Federal Reserve is scheduled to attend a banking regulation-related meeting and deliver opening remarks at 20:30 Beijing time tonight. Given the recent pressure from Trump and Republican lawmakers regarding the excessive spending on the renovation project of the Federal Reserve headquarters, his speech tonight is highly anticipated by traders and investors. It is expected that Powell will not make a direct statement on this matter in tonight's speech but may once again emphasize the significance of the Fed's independence.The renovation budget for the Federal Reserve headquarters building has increased from $1.5 billion to $25 to $26 billion, which is far beyond expectations. There are rumors involving luxury facilities such as a rooftop garden and a private elevator, which have led to public and political inquiries about its extravagance. Trump and others took the opportunity to criticize Federal Reserve Chairman Powell and questioned his transparenc

item.title: Bitcoin Rebounds Breaks $118,000, 24-hour Loss Narrows to 1.2%
item.description: On July 22nd, based on HTX market data, Bitcoin saw a rebound and exceeded $118,000. The 24-hour decline narrowed to 1.2%.

item.title: The total open interest of Ethereum futures contracts across all exchanges has surpassed $58 billion, reaching a record high, with a more than 96% increase on the 30th.
item.description: On July 22nd, based on Coinglass data, market participants are continuously increasing their wagers on the movement of Ethereum. The total open interest of Ethereum futures contracts across all exchanges has been on an upward trend for more than a month and has once again exceeded $58 billion today, hitting a new all-time high. On June 22nd, the total open interest of Ethereum futures contracts was reported to be $29.5 billion, indicating a growth of over 96% in the past 30 days.In addition, the total open interest of Bitcoin futures contracts across all exchanges is currently at $84.77 billion, representing a growth of over 23.8% in the past 30 days.

item.title: Hyperliquid Whale Activity: Multiple whale contract positions have changed in the past hour, primarily through sell-offs
item.description: On July 22nd, as per the monitoring of HyperInsight, within just over 1 hour, several whales witnessed changes in their holdings of Hyperliquid contracts and made significant deposits. These include:The whale with the address starting with 0x257e1E opened a 20x long position in ETH, with an entry price of $3,799.87 and a holding amount of $18,279,171.90; the liquidation price was $3,498.616.The whale with the address starting with 0x880ac4 increased its short position in ETH by 11.10 tokens, raising the position amount by $940,831.83. The current PnL is -$15,855,717.73, and the current liquidation price is $4,858.081.The whale with the address starting with 0xb5a692 reduced its long position in BTC by 100.68 tokens, reducing the position amount by $11,715,568.31. The current PnL is $94,280.46, and the current liquidation price is $103,603.717.The whale with the address starting with 0x5d2f44 reduced its short posit

item.title: The Bank of Japan may keep its key interest rate unchanged next week
item.description: July 22, Market News: It is reported that the Bank of Japan is likely to maintain its benchmark interest rate unchanged in the coming week; the Bank of Japan considers that the election will have a minimal impact on its rate stance. (Kinetic Element)

item.title: Meme Coin Ani Market Cap Surges Above $63 Million, 24-hour Gain 58.22%
item.description: On July 22nd, based on the GMGN market data, the market capitalization of the Grok humanoid companion concept Meme coin Ani surged above $63 million. It achieved a 24-hour gain of 58.22% and a 24-hour trading volume of $23.6 million.BlockBeats reminds users that many Meme coins lack practical use cases and have high price volatility. Therefore, investment should be approached with caution.

item.title: A-share Stablecoin Concept Stock Dongxin Trust Soared to Daily Limit Today
item.description: On July 22nd, based on market information, the A-share stablecoin concept stock Dongxin Hesheng witnessed a daily limit up, and today's trading volume reached 5.88 billion US dollars.BlockBeats previously reported that Conflux Network has reached a strategic cooperation with AnchorX and Dongxin Hesheng, aiming to jointly promote the landing of offshore RMB stablecoin issuance, cross-border settlement, RWA, and other application scenarios in countries participating in the "Belt and Road" initiative. The three parties plan to participate in pilot projects in Central Asia, Southeast Asia, and other regions.

item.title: WXT peaked at 0.3751, reaching an all-time high, entering the holding group to receive a $20 WXT airdrop.
item.description: On July 22nd, the token of the WEEX platform, WEEX Token (WXT), has reached a series of all-time highs in the past two days. On this day, it reached a peak of 0.3751 US dollars, which is a 275% increase from its listing price a year ago.According to an announcement in the official community group of WXT holders, starting from today until July 31st, the first 50 new members (holding at least 688 WXT) will each receive a $20 worth of WXT airdrop, and the total prize pool is $1,000.

item.title: Trump's Son Responds to Criticism: ETH Up 35% in 5 Months, Should Embrace Volatility and Buy the Dip
item.description: On July 22nd, Eric Trump, the son of former President Donald Trump, responded on social media to a comment that "ETH dropped by approximately 40% after his tweet on February 4th announcing an ETH purchase." Eric Trump said, "ETH has increased by 35% in 5 months. Embrace the volatility. If you are smart, you should buy when the price dips just like I said."Earlier reports showed that since Eric Trump's "ETH purchase" tweet on March 31st, the price of ETH fell from around $2,880 to $1,820, representing a decline of about 40%.
